summary: An Ordinance appropriating money from the General Fund of the City of Seattle as a temporary loan to Local Improvement Fund, District No. 3005, Ordinance No. 36184, for the improvement of Forty-seventh Avenue Southwest, et al, said money to be used by the Board of Public Works for the completion of the improvement of the streets as ordered by said Ordinance No. 36184, and to be repaid to the General Fund from the first moneys belonging to said district and available for that purpose.
